TopicTitle: F/A-18 Super Hornet (With AIM-9X and drop tank)

Articles.Content:
And, I have a more faithful F/A-18 Super hornet. Drop tank and weapons-officer included. (Missiles were upgraded to actual AIM-9X specs. I forgot to put in the second pilot in some of the screenshots, but it has a second cockpit along with extremely good low speed handling). Do not forget to turn on SAS. This jet requires fly by wire.

Download: http://db.orangedox.com/Zur0NLKtJafmO6GViW/FA-18%20Super%20Hornet.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I think it could come in handy in ground battles. Once multiplayer gets released, anyone want to dogfight me? :)

PS: Missiles were made unstable on purpose. I intend to shoot down super-maneuverable jets in dogfights by letting the RIO slave the missile controls.

-COMING SOON-

Iron Dome.

Super maneuverable supersonic missiles with fine-controls. It even has a reinforced warhead to kill heavy aircraft, and I've shot down one of the retired FX-II prototypes with it.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited August 24, 2014 by andrew123
Great work! Replicas of U.S. Navy crafts will always get you rep from me especially when they look this good! Keep it up!

Thank you.

I've got a few other replicas on the way, including the Avenger SAM system.

HOOYAH! One of the benefits of living in San Diego is getting to see those monstrous aircraft carriers.
